tours.activities: Billiards Table, Breakfast, City Tour, Drink Bar, Historical Monuments, Lunch, Private Cinema
tours.overview: Embark on an Enchanting Journey through Geneva, Switzerland. Discover the captivating blend of tradition and modernity in the picturesque city of Geneva. Our tour invites you to experience the pristine beauty of Lake Geneva, with its stunning Jet d'Eau fountain and panoramic Alpine views. Wander through the Old Town’s charming cobblestone streets, where history meets contemporary life, and explore the grandeur of St. Peter's Cathedral. Delve into the city’s international atmosphere with a visit to the United Nations headquarters and immerse yourself in the world of humanitarian efforts. Enjoy the cultural richness, gastronomic delights, and the tranquil ambiance of this cosmopolitan gem. Let our expert guides illuminate the stories and beauty that make Geneva an unforgettable destination.
tours.outline: Geneva is Switzerland's second-largest city and is renowned as a significant diplomatic center globally. It is famous for its stunning lake views, with the Jet d'Eau, a high fountain, being one of the city's iconic symbols. Geneva hosts major international organizations including the United Nations. The city boasts a rich historical heritage, surrounded by lakes, mountains, and a vibrant cultural scene. Its grand cathedrals, elegant shops, and delicious restaurants make it a cultural and touristic hub.
tours.planone: Morning: Arrival and Transfer to Hotel Afternoon: Discover Lake Geneva and the iconic Jet d'Eau Fountain Evening: Enjoy local cuisine at Leckeres Restaurant
tours.plantwo: Morning: Visit St. Peter's Cathedral and explore the Old Town Afternoon: Tour the United Nations office in Geneva Evening: Shopping on Rue du Rhône or relax at a local café in Place du Bourg-de-Four
tours.planthree: Morning: Excursion to Château de Chillon and a day trip to Montreux Afternoon: Enjoy a delightful wine tasting at Lavaux Vineyards Evening: Savor Mediterranean cuisine at Restaurant L'Arquebuse

tours.activities: Billiards Table, Breakfast, City Tour, Drink Bar, Historical Monuments, Lunch, Private Cinema
tours.overview: Whether you’re a foodie, museum lover or history buff, there’s an Istanbul private tour that’s perfect for you! From delicious authentic Dürüms to Hagia Sophia tours, thanks to your local host every tour is an amazing experience!
tours.outline: Istanbul offers something for everyone, and the best way to explore for yourself this huge city is by touring according to your interests. Whether you’re into art, food, history, or all of the above, there is a tour in Istanbul for you!
tours.planone: We will pick you up from your hotel/airport, then we will visit Princes’ Islands. And of the tour, we will drop you back to the hotel/airport.
tours.plantwo: The group of islands takes their name from Roman times when the princes were sent there on exile. It is also known as pleasure realm of Byzantine dynasty youngsters. There are 9 islands with a different size. No car is permitted and transport is provided with electric cars (buggies). On the islands there are many glorious mansions with characteristic overhanging balconies and most of which are inhabited only during the summer. Area is an awesome place both for swimming and for relaxing in the forests in the sound of silence.
tours.planthree: Free Time: Depending on the season you can walk around or swim for two hours.

tours.activities: Billiards Table, Breakfast, City Tour, Drink Bar, Historical Monuments, Lunch, Private Cinema
tours.overview: Whether you’re a foodie, museum lover or history buff, there’s an Istanbul private tour that’s perfect for you! From delicious authentic Dürüms to Hagia Sophia tours, thanks to your local host every tour is an amazing experience!
tours.outline: Istanbul offers something for everyone, and the best way to explore for yourself this huge city is by touring according to your interests. Whether you’re into art, food, history, or all of the above, there is a tour in Istanbul for you!
tours.planone: We will pick you up from your hotel or airport, then we will visit Hippodrome, Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia Grand Mosque, Blue Mosque, Hippodrome and Grand Covered Bazaar. And of the tour, we will drop you back to the hotel or airport.
tours.plantwo: Hippodrome, where charriot races were organised during the Byzantine Period. The stadium held 100,000 spectators and featured objects from all corners of the empire. We will see during the Hippodrome Trip; The German Fountain of Wilhelm II, Egyptian Obelisk, Serpentıne Column and The Column of Constantıne.
tours.planthree: Grand Bazaar, the commercial heart of the old city with its 4,000 shops. It’s considered as one of the largest covered markets of the world and has full of treasures – including carpets and kilims, silks, jewellery, ceramics, icons, and leather goods.

tours.activities: Billiards Table, Breakfast, City Tour, Drink Bar, Historical Monuments, Lunch, Private Cinema
tours.overview: Experience the City of Love like never before with our Paris Tour. Immerse yourself in the charm and romance of this iconic city as you explore its timeless landmarks. From the elegant Eiffel Tower to the artistic haven of Montmartre, our guided tour takes you on a captivating journey through history, art, and culture. Indulge in the exquisite French cuisine, stroll along the Seine, and marvel at the beauty of Notre-Dame Cathedral. With our expert guides, discover the secrets and stories behind each cobblestone street and monument. Unveil the magic of Paris and create memories to cherish for a lifetime on our meticulously crafted tour..
tours.outline: You can make a comparison by examining all tour options for the most suitable Greek Island tours prices for your budget, and you can go on your Greek Islands tour by choosing one of the most suitable tour options for you. If you are wondering why I should choose Greek Island Tours by ship, you should know that going on an island tour by ship is a wonderful thing like traveling in a floating hotel. Greek Islands Cruises provide you with a great holiday with open buffet food and drinks, tea hours, various shows, live music, sun loungers where you can sunbathe while watching the sea, view and sky, and many other beauties.
tours.planone: We are on our way to Thassos Island tour. After the passport and customs procedures we will do here, we continue on our way with the night journey.
tours.plantwo: We come to the İpsala border gate late at night and have our customs procedures done. After customs procedures, we move to Kavala for breakfast, we take our breakfast in Kavala, where we will arrive early in the morning, and then we visit the city of Kavala with our guide. we are going to the beach.
tours.planthree: After breakfast at the hotel in the morning, we do our check-out process. Free time until the time our guide will inform. Our guests can join the Thassos Island Beaches and Panagia Village tour, which will be organized as an extra.

tours.activities: Billiards Table, Breakfast, City Tour, Drink Bar, Historical Monuments, Lunch, Private Cinema
tours.overview: Experience the City of Love like never before with our Paris Tour. Immerse yourself in the charm and romance of this iconic city as you explore its timeless landmarks. From the elegant Eiffel Tower to the artistic haven of Montmartre, our guided tour takes you on a captivating journey through history, art, and culture. Indulge in the exquisite French cuisine, stroll along the Seine, and marvel at the beauty of Notre-Dame Cathedral. With our expert guides, discover the secrets and stories behind each cobblestone street and monument. Unveil the magic of Paris and create memories to cherish for a lifetime on our meticulously crafted tour.
tours.outline: When you think of France, the first city that comes to mind is undoubtedly Paris. Paris is one of Europe's most visited cities. It is seen as the city of romance. In addition, as a fashion center, it is one of the most important stops for shopping enthusiasts. Paris, with its many historical monuments, museums, cultural and artistic activities, and entertainment opportunities, attracts tourists like a magnet. Paris, which has a continental climate, has streets that can take on different beauties throughout the year. For this reason, it welcomes millions of domestic and foreign tourists in every season of the year. However, it is frequently preferred due to the increasing cultural and artistic activities especially in the summer months.
tours.planone: Departure to Paris after ticket, baggage and passport procedures. In the city tour to be held upon arrival in Paris; Eiffel Tower, famous shopping street Champs Elysees, Louvre Museum, Victory Square and Arch, Napoleon's Tomb are among the places to see. After our city tour, transfer to our hotel and overnight at our hotel.
tours.plantwo: After breakfast, our guests can join the Paris Masterpieces Tour, which will be organized as an extra. After the tour, transfer to our hotel. In the evening, our guests can join the Lido Cabaret Show Tour, which will be organized as an extra. After our tour, transfer to our hotel and overnight at our hotel.
tours.planthree: After breakfast, our guests can join the Disneyland Trip to be organized as an extra. The opportunity to experience an enjoyable and unforgettable day with activities that appeal to all ages awaits you. It is an unmissable opportunity for fairy tale lovers, speed and entertainment enthusiasts, those who want to relive their childhood or those who are still children. After our Disneyland trip, transfer to our hotel and overnight at our hotel.

tours.activities: Billiards Table, Breakfast, City Tour, Drink Bar, Historical Monuments, Lunch, Private Cinema
tours.overview: Dubai tours allow you to have a perfect holiday with advantageous options. Tours to the most beautiful spots of Dubai also help you experience the rising star of the Middle East world up close. If you want to explore this magical geography with Dubai tour opportunities and have an unforgettable holiday, you can give yourself a very valuable gift right now.
tours.outline: Dubai tours are among the most preferred international tours thanks to their affordable price options. The most suitable Dubai tours offered to you impress with options suitable for every budget. Dubai tour prices, which allow you to spend a romantic getaway alone with your lover or spouse, or to have a holiday full of fun and excitement with your whole family, make you smile with the convenience of payment that does not tire your budget.
tours.planone: After the ticket, baggage and boarding procedures, we move to Sharjah airport with Airlines.
tours.plantwo: After our baggage procedures, meeting with our vehicle and guide waiting for us in the area, and then Transfer to our hotel. Overnight at our hotel. After breakfast, we start our tour of Dubai icons and the city at the hour determined by our guide. We will start our tour by seeing the winter palace of Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoom, the Sheikh of Dubai, of the United Arab Emirates. In the meantime, you can take pictures with the peacocks that will accompany us. Afterwards, we will have the chance to see all the world-famous skyscrapers and shopping centers of Dubai panoramically on the road with our journey on Sheikh Zaeed Street, the busiest road of Dubai, named after the founder of the Emirate. Then, Blue Waters island, which was opened by filling the sea in 2018 (Ceasers Palace Hotel, Dubai Eye will be visited panoramically) will be seen panoramically and then we will have the chance to photograph Dubai's 3rd largest and first completed Palm island with a photo break at the Marina. we will. Then, on the way to Jumeirah Beach, which is known as the busiest and richest street of Dubai, we will see the world's only 7-star hotel Burj Al Arab hotel, known as the symbol of Dubai, with a panoramic view. After the photo break we will give here, we will move to the Deira region, which is called the old city of Dubai, and visit the Gold Bazaar, the last stop of our tour. Transfer to our hotel after the tour. Dhow Cruise Dubai boat tour with dinner for our guests who wish in the evening. We wish you a pleasant time in this tour, where we will have dinner accompanied by an open buffet and a boat trip. Overnight at our hotel.
tours.planthree: After our breakfast, Madinat Jumeirah, Souk Madinat, Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall and Fountain Show tour will take place for our guests who wish. (Burj Khalifa Entry Fee Not Included). Our first trip in this tour will be Madinat Jumeirah. This holiday village built on 400 acres; Along the 2 km long beach, there are 5-star hotels, 29 summer villas, 40 restaurants and a big bazaar. Reminiscent of the city of Venice, this traditional bazaar will please you because it has the old architectural features of the region and perhaps offers a wide variety of souvenirs. Our second stop is Burj Khalifa, the world's largest architecture. Burj Khalifa (Burj Khalifa), which has the title of the tallest building in the world with a length of 828 meters, is named after Khalifa bin Zayed and has more than 160 floors. Our next stop in our tour will be the Dubai Mall, which is known as one of the largest shopping centers in the world, with a capacity of 1200 shops. You can buy all kinds of electronics stores, souvenirs, and local products such as quality processed dates here. You can attend the Fountain water, sound and light show whenever you want during our Dubai Mall tour. Overnight at our hotel.

tours.activities: Billiards Table, Breakfast, City Tour, Drink Bar, Historical Monuments, Lunch, Private Cinema
tours.overview: Since America has a very wide geographical area in terms of places to see, it draws attention as a country that should be visited with a few tours. The Miami and Orlando tour is seen as the most affordable American tour. Touristic facilities and swimming options in this region are among the attractive advantages for holidaymakers. It is seen that the New York tour is an economical choice for tourists with its attractive prices.
tours.outline: If you are going to participate in tours to regions such as Miami and Hawaii that come to the fore with their sea and summer tourism, you should prefer warm seasons. If you visit these regions during the cold seasons, you may not get the chance to swim in the unique seas. If you want to visit regions such as New York and Arizona, you can enjoy these regions by experiencing different beauties in all four seasons.
tours.planone: After our arrival in Miami, we leave the airport with our private vehicle and set off to transfer to our hotel. Coconut Grove, which is surrounded by stylish shops, the coastline is full of sailing clubs, and is home to Mongrov forests, Versace's mansion, one of the symbols of Miami Beach, Little Havana, where Cuban immigrants live, Wynwood, where famous street painting artists worked together and turned into a gigantic work of art. district, Historic Biltmore hotel, Bay Side, Miami Beach and Lincoln road are among the places we will see during the city tour. At the end of the tour, we go to our hotel to relieve the tiredness of the day
tours.plantwo: Free time after breakfast at the hotel. Our guests can join the tour to the southernmost point of the USA, which will be organized as an extra. Key West is actually a chain of islands consisting of many islets, with the view of the Atlantic Ocean on one side and the Gulf of Mexico on the other. It is a city that is especially recommended to watch the sunset, where there are very cute houses with large verandas and ceiling fans on their verandas. During our tour, the home of the American Nobel Prize winner Ernest Hemingway, Duval Street, where shops, cafes, restaurants and art galleries are located, on the other end of this street, SouthernMost, on which there is a 90-mile inscription to Cuba, showing that you are at the southernmost end of the USA. Point, the winter home of former president Harry S. Truman, is among the places to see. We end our tour by stopping by Isla Morada to watch the sunset with live music. We gather at the time determined by our guide and go to our hotel to rest.
tours.planthree: Free time after breakfast at the hotel. Our guests can join the Sawgrass Mills Outlet Tour with Lunch, which will be organized as an extra. You will be able to buy world famous brands at discounted prices. During our tour, we will have our lunch at the world-famous Hard Rock Cafe. At the end of the tour, we will transfer to our hotel.

tours.activities: Breakfast, City Tour, Drink Bar, Lunch, Private Cinema, Swimming Pool
tours.overview: The Far East is waiting to be discovered with tours. You will find peace in the magnificent nature of Bangkok and Pattaya on the Far East tours, where you will meet the magnificent structures and friendly people of the Far East, and you will be amazed by the colorful world of the big cities in Hong Kong. So, are you ready to travel to the fairy tale lands of the Far East and discover brand new cultures and different lands? Ideal tour times are a very important issue for our guests who want to go on a journey with Far East tours. Ideal times for guests who want to tour Thailand are between December and February. Spring and autumn are the right times for our guests who want to go to China. The time you prefer for a Hong Kong tour should be between October and December. Travelers who want to tour Malaysia can evaluate the dates from the end of July to November. The ideal times for a trip to Singapore are October and November or April and May. The ideal travel period for a tour of Indonesia is the period starting from April and lasting until October.
tours.outline: We set out to discover unique cities with Far East tours. The first stop on this privileged tour abroad is Bangkok. When you go to the 46-meter-long Wat Traimit Temple in Bangkok, you will see the Reclining Buddha Statue, Stupas, Sitting Buddha Statue, Royal Temple Wat Pho and the Golden Buddha Statue. Your journey to see these unique beauties will definitely be worth it. Bangkok is a country very famous for its seafood, you should definitely try different seafood dishes. Pattaya, the coastal city of Thailand, awaits you with its sea, sand, sun and magnificent nature. Pattaya is also very famous for its nightlife.
tours.planone: Meeting with you, our esteemed guests, in front of the Airport Terminal counter. Departure of Singapore Airlines after baggage, ticket and boarding procedures.
tours.plantwo: Arrival in Singapore. After our arrival, our flight to Bangkok takes place with the Singapore Airlines plane. In our tour, the world-famous Reclining Buddha statue with a length of 46 meters and a height of 15 meters, the Sitting Buddha statue, Stupas, the Royal Temple Wat Pho and the Wat Traimit Temple, which has a 5.5-ton Golden Buddha statue, are among the places to visit. Chinatown, the Flower Market, the Parliament Building and the mansion of Thailand's current king in Bangkok will be panoramically visible. At the end of the tour, free time after transfer and room allocation. Then the Bangkok canal tour, which our guide will organize as an extra. On this tour, you have the opportunity to see interesting sights that you will not see anywhere else in the world with our private boat in the historical canals of Bangkok. You will get to know the Thai life on the canals closely, and you will witness the fusion of the rich and the poor of Thailand. We will feed the sacred catfish in front of one of the temples and before we finish our tour, we will see Wat Arun, one of the 3 most famous temples in Bangkok, with its magnificent architecture.
tours.planthree: After our breakfast, we are carrying out our Phuket City Tour with our guests who wish. On our tour with our local guide, we discover all the natural beauty and culture of Phuket. After picking up our guests from our hotel, we start with a visit to the top attractions such as the huge Buddha Statue and Wat Chalong temple. Then Phuket Old Town, Tiger Park and Cashew Nut Factory are among the places to see. After our photo breaks at points with a unique Phuket View, we return to our hotel.

tours.outline: Our first stop on our cruise boat will be Panak and Hong islands, which have been the subject of many documentaries. During this trip we will make with our special canoes, an adventure awaits you where you will witness magnificent nature views among the bays and caves. After lunch on our boat as an open buffet, our next stop is James Bond Island, where the James Bond Man with the Golden Gun episode was filmed. We see the famous rock and beach on this island, free time to shop with the Muslim villagers on the island and take lots of photos. Our last stop after James Bond Island will be Lawa Island or Naka Island, where we can swim, sunbathe and relax on the beach.
tours.planone: Meeting with you, our esteemed guests, in front of the Airport Terminal counter. Departure of Singapore Airlines after baggage, ticket and boarding procedures.
tours.planthree: After our breakfast, we are carrying out our Phuket City Tour with our guests who wish. On our tour with our local guide, we discover all the natural beauty and culture of Phuket. After picking up our guests from our hotel, we start with a visit to the top attractions such as the huge Buddha Statue and Wat Chalong temple. Then Phuket Old Town, Tiger Park and Cashew Nut Factory are among the places to see. After our photo breaks at points with a unique Phuket View, we return to our hotel.

tours.overview: Bangkok, the capital of Thailand, is also the country's largest city in terms of culture and economy. Offering a great combination of traditional and modern, the city manages to offer countless beauties and interesting things to its visitors with Bangkok tours. One of the most popular tourism centers in Asia, it promises an unforgettable experience with its beautiful temples, lively markets, food stalls, famous Bangkok nightlife and different lifestyle.The day starts with breakfast and continues with the journey to Pattaya. On the way, we will visit a jewelry factory and see how precious stones such as sapphires and rubies from Thailand are processed and turned into jewelry. Our guests will be able to shop. After our arrival in Pattaya, we will be transferred to our hotel.

tours.planthree: On this tour, we go out of Bangkok and first stop by a coconut farm in Samut Songkram town, where the world-renowned Siam Twins were born. Here, we get information about what the Thai people use from the coconut tree, we see the souvenirs made from this tree, you can also visit the orchid garden inside.
